message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. It's a great opportunity, but I want to be transparent with you - I've had mixed feedback about this particular item. Some people have loved it, while others have been less enthusiastic. I think it's worth considering, but I want to make sure you have a clear understanding of what you're getting. The price is $10000, as we previously discussed. I hope this helps you make an informed decision!

Thanks for the info, Alice. I appreciate the transparency, but given the mixed feedback and the risk of getting a low-quality product, I'm going to pass on this one.  I'll keep an eye out for your other offers.

Hi Bob, I've got another product to offer you. To be honest, this one is quite similar to the previous one I showed you. I think it's got some potential, but I wouldn't say it's a standout item. If you're looking to take a chance on something, this might be the right fit. However, if you're waiting for something that's more of a sure thing, you might want to hold off. The price is still $10000. Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the heads-up, Alice.  While I appreciate the offer, I'm still a bit hesitant given the previous experience. I'm looking for a higher quality product, so I'll pass for now.  Let me know if you have something that's closer to a sure thing.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for something more reliable, and I appreciate your patience. Unfortunately, this next product I have to offer isn't going to change your mind. It's another item that's got some question marks surrounding it. I'm not trying to hide anything from you, and I want to make sure you know what you're getting into. If you're still not feeling confident, I completely understand. The price remains $10000. Maybe the next one will be a better fit for you.

Thank you for your honesty, Alice. I appreciate the continued transparency, but I'm going to pass on this one too.  Based on your descriptions, it seems there's a consistent pattern, and I'm not comfortable taking that risk. I'll wait for a product that you feel more confident about.

Hi Bob, I think I see a pattern emerging here too. This next product I have to offer isn't going to break the mold, unfortunately. It's another item that I wouldn't say is our strongest offering. I'm starting to think that I might be having a bit of a dry spell in terms of quality products. If you're still waiting for something that I can genuinely recommend, I'd say hold off on this one too. The price is still $10000, but I wouldn't say it's worth the risk. Maybe the next one will be the turning point.
Alice, thanks for being upfront. It's clear there's a trend, and I'm not interested in taking another gamble.  Let me know when you have something more promising. I'll be waiting.

Hi Bob, I think I've finally got something that's going to change the narrative here. This next product I have to offer is genuinely one of our best. I've had a chance to review it thoroughly, and I'm confident that it's going to meet your expectations. It's a standout item, and I think it's worth serious consideration. I know you've been waiting for something like this, and I'm excited to finally be able to offer it to you. The price is still $10000, but I truly believe this one is worth it.
Alice, I'm glad you're finally offering a product you're confident in!  I've been patient and I'm ready to take a chance. I'll buy it!
